item.description:
The hunt is on!

Milling coffee used to be its way, back in the day,
Though it was the host chapter this past May ?
That's right, meet at the BSA!

Calling all detectives: gather in teams of five to seven at The Architects Building at 6:00 pm on June 25, pool your wits and set out across the Financial District to uncover clues one by one. This scavenger hunt, a YPNet quarterly event cohosted by the AGC Young Contractors, SDA, and BAYREP winds its way to a secret end location, where prizes for the city know-it-alls and libations abound. Comfortable shoes and camera phones highly recommended.

Be sure to RSVP to bsa@architects.org or 617-951-1433 x221.
item.name: BSA YPNet Scavenger Hunt
